input.sentences: look at the peaceful bird perched upon the sacred stone .
a once in a life time trip . one that will never be forgotten .
yes | people do actually ride camels here .
very special area that all people want to catch a glimpse of while visiting .
most of the tour crowd trying to get ready to tour the area .
output.sentences: Tourists had heard there was a sacred bird perching near the pyramids.
Typically the wanted to see the Sphynx and a pyramid but today the bird was the attraction.
The guides mounted camels and directed them to the place where the bird had been spotted.
By the time the reached the place, the bird had flown away.
The tourists were still happy to be able to see the other sights.
